title: McKinsey keyword learning method
original_prompt: Do you know McKinsey's method for quickly understanding industries? It's about building concepts through a large number of high-frequency industry keywords. Now, I'm a newbie who doesn't understand AI tools. Please sort out 30 common keywords for me, make them into a Markdown table, with the headers: Keyword (English), Category (Chinese), Introduction (limited to 50 words), and Customer Service Use Case.
input1: "I am exploring the field of artificial intelligence and its applications in various industries. Can you help me understand the key concepts and terminology used in this domain? I would like to see a comprehensive list of keywords that can help me grasp the fundamentals."
input2: "As a business analyst, I am tasked with researching the impact of AI on customer service. I need to familiarize myself with the relevant industry terms and their implications. Please provide a detailed list of keywords that are essential for understanding AI in this context."
